title: Nevves of Sr. VValter Rauleigh With the true description of Guiana: as also a relation of the excellent gouernment, and much hope of the prosperity of the voyage. Sent from a gentleman of his fleet, to a most especiall friend of his in London. From the riuer of Caliana, on the coast of Guiana, Nouemb. 17. 1617.
author: R. M., fl. 1617.
publisher: Printed [by George Eld] for H. G[osson] and are to be sold by I. Wright, at the signe of the Bible without New-gate,
